article.title: AtHoc Awarded Air Force Central Command Contract for Network-Centric Emergency Notification System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: AtHoc Incorporated has been awarded a $5.4 million contract by the U.S. Air Force Central Command (USAFCENT) for a theater-wide deployment of AtHoc IWSAlerts. AtHoc IWSAlerts will be deployed over Secret Internet Protocol Router Network (SIPRNET) and Non-Secure Internet Protocol Router Network (NIPRNET), providing emergency alerting over USAFCENT's classified and unclassified networks.
